nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 21, with temperatures rising to around 26 overnight. South wind 5 to 8 mph.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Light Rain Likely
nws.detailedForecast: Rain likely after 2pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 40. South wind 10 to 26 mph, with gusts as high as 36 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.shortForecast: Light Snow And Areas Of Blowing Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 7pm, then a slight chance of snow between 11pm and midnight, then snow and areas of blowing snow. Mostly cloudy. Low around 6, with temperatures rising to around 13 overnight. Northwest wind 30 to 40 mph, with gusts as high as 60 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.shortForecast: Light Snow Likely And Areas Of Blowing Snow then Mostly Sunny
nws.detailedForecast: Snow likely and areas of blowing snow before 9am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 11. Wind chill values as low as -20. Northwest wind 10 to 40 mph, with gusts as high as 61 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 2. East wind 3 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

nws.name: Friday
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before noon. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 35. South wind 15 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Light Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow after midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 10. West wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

nws.name: Saturday
